input_text:
Job Title: Junior Java Developer

Location: Atlanta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Overview

Job Purpose

At Intercontinental Exchange (ICE), we engineer technology, exchanges and clearing houses that connect companies around the world to global capital and derivative markets. With a leading-edge approach to developing technology platforms, we have built market infrastructure in all major trading centers, offering customers the ability to manage risk and make informed decisions globally. By leveraging our core strengths in technology, we continue to identify new ways to serve our customers and transform global markets. We're looking for motivated, results-oriented people to join our team.

As an intern, you be exposed to the design, development, maintenance, and support of critical and highly visible platforms for ICE. You will work under the guidance of a more senior engineer on an existing product team to develop real-world skills. The ideal candidate must be results-oriented, self-motivated, and can thrive in a fast-paced environment. This is a temporary position that will last approximately 10 -12 weeks.

Responsibilities

Participate in the design, architecture, and planning of technology solutions to meet the business needParticipate in the development of new methods, procedures, processes, or systemsCollaborate with team members and stakeholdersCreate comprehensive unit tests for new development itemsAdhere to coding style guidelines and development best practices

Knowledge And Experience

Currently pursuing a bachelorâ€™s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related fieldSolid problem-solving and analytical skillsGood attitude and eager to learnExperience in an object-oriented programming language such as Java or C++Good understanding of data structuresBasic understanding of multi-threaded processing / concurrencyBasic understanding of security concerns for web-based applicationsBasic understanding of SDLCAbility to work in a team environmentEffective communication skillsExperience with Git preferred

Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin or ancestry, age, disability or veteran status, or other protected status.

Experience Level (if available): None
